(Eh, no one can really match another RPGer's style or skill.)

::KitKat::
"Hurry." she said in almost a whisper. She prayed her love would make 
it out of there safely.  



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit frowns, looking at the base. He wanted to impress KitKat.
> 
> "I can make it in 10 seconds," he says, looking at her.
> 
> 
> (I gave up trying to imitate Robo's style, I just can't match his 
> skill.)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::KitKat::
> > "No, I don't want to risk it."
> > She opened her link to Quickstrike. "Get out of the base Now! It's 
> > going to blow up in 10 seconds!
